accelerator:Cloud.NAME: Infinite Speeds
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 additional Orb slot, [E] and heal 3 HP on your first turn. NL At the end of every turn, #yEvoke your next #yOrb.

accelerator:LaserPointer.NAME: Laser Pointer
accelerator:LaserPointer.FLAVOR: Let it show you the way.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b4 #ySkills in a single turn, gain #b1 #yFocus.

accelerator:AutoCompiler.NAME: Auto-Compiler
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.

accelerator:HolographicKunai.NAME: Holographic Kunai
accelerator:HolographicKunai.FLAVOR: It becomes more real with every bit of energy it absorbs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yChannel #b3 unique Orbs in a single turn, gain #b1 #yDexterity.

accelerator:HolographicShuriken.NAME: Holographic Shuriken
accelerator:HolographicShuriken.FLAVOR: It becomes more real with every bit of energy it absorbs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yChannel #b3 unique Orbs in a single turn, gain #b1 #yStrength.

accelerator:HolographicFan.NAME: Holographic Fan
accelerator:HolographicFan.FLAVOR: It becomes more real with every bit of energy it absorbs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yChannel #b3 unique Orbs in a single turn, gain #b4 #yBlock.

accelerator:HolographicScroll.NAME: Holographic Scroll
accelerator:HolographicScroll.FLAVOR: It becomes more real with every bit of energy it absorbs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yChannel #b4 unique Orbs in a single turn, gain #b1 #yFocus.

accelerator:BetterCloud.NAME: Octahedron Of Transcendence
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gInfinite #gSpeeds. NL You have #b1 additional Orb slot. NL Gain #b2 additional [E] [E] and heal #b2 HP at the start of first #b2 turns of every combat. NL At the end of every turn, #yEvoke your next #yOrb.
